summary: This is an email from an individual stating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams, providing contact information for urgent assistance related to case Cr. 490 (RMB) and for other matters. It appears to be a professional notification regarding legal proceedings.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge over the trial mentioned by the email sender.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Contact person for urgent assistance related to case Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Contact person for all other matters.

events.title: Email notification of ongoing trial
events.description: An individual sends an email stating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.

keyFacts: The email sender is currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.
The email provides contact information for urgent assistance related to case Cr. 490 (RMB).
The email is dated August 26, 2019, indicating ongoing legal proceedings at that time.
